overview: Enter the mind of the world’s greatest con man – and get that dough.  One of history’s greatest swindlers, professional counterfeiter Frank Bourassa infamously printed an estimated $250 million in fake currency notes. This AR piece by Brett Gaylor, Nicolas Bourniquel and Arnaud Colinart (Notes on Blindness Into Darkness, MIFF 2016) lets you in on this man’s transformation from honest worker to expert crim.
title: Fortune!
